resources.string: I throw my gems into the drain

One day walking along a quiet street, you suddenly get the urge to get rid of your gem collection. Luckily the street has plenty of drains, each of them with holes in different shapes. In short: Not every gem fits every drain. But even if you choose the correct gem, it will have to be aligned correctly!

You walk towards the right side of the game area. From time to time you pass drains with holes in different shapes - you have to find the right gem in your inventory. Therefore, on the left of the screen, you have an overview of your four different gem types that obviously differ in shape.
Choose the right type of gem by pressing with your finger and the gem\'s shape is displayed at the center of the screen. As long as you hold your finger, you can change the gem\'s orientation.

As soon as you lift your finger, the gem drops. If you aligned it correctly, the gem will fall into the drain! Remember that it takes the gem a while to reach the ground, so get a feeling for an appropriate drop-off timing!

If you hit, you lose the gem\'s total worth (round gem: $1.000,- eight-sided gem: $2.000,- four-sided gem: $3.000,- and finally diamond: $4.000,-). If the gem breaks (e.g., hitting the wrong drain or the correct drain but misaligned), you lose a tenth of the gem\'s value. Hitting the dusty road doesn\'t destroy the gem - so you won\'t lose anything.
The game is finished if you reach the end of the road or if you get rid of your whole gem collection
Choose a gem from the left by holding a button
Rotate your device to align the gem to the drain
Release the gem to through it into the drain
